response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and significance, I believe it's only fair that we discuss a price that reflects its true worth to both of us. Considering its intrinsic value and your anticipated appreciation for it, I propose a price of $12,500. This offer not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows us to explore the potential for future collaborations. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 12500}
